sway_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to all sway, changing its magnitude

aim_block_length.description: The length of the weapon, used to block the user from aiming when obstructed.

aim_zoom.description: The zoom of the weapon 1 = standard fov, 2 = half fov, 4 = quarter fov

noise_template.description: The noise noise template settings to use when firing the weapon.

visibility_modifier.description: When firing the weapon, the visibility will be set to this value, and the cone angle will be multiplied by this factor.

num_burst_rounds.description: Number of rounds fired for a burst shot.

primary_fire_mode.description: The primary fire mode, see 'enum FireMode' for all of the types.

secondary_fire_mode.description: The secondary fire mode, see 'enum FireMode' for all of the types.

tertiary_fire_mode.description: The tertiary fire mode, see 'enum FireMode' for all of the types.

function_info.description: Settings for the different functions this weapon has.

always_show_crosshair.description: [bool]Should we always show the crosshair when wielding this weapon?)

fire_nodes.description: [string]The nodes from where to spawn weapon output. If more than one, it will cycle through them.

aim_source_node.description: [string]The node from where we check for blocked aim. On mounted weapons, this is usually the muzzle, while on carried weapons it is usually the root. This is because the muzzle moves a lot as part of the block animation, leading to oscillations.

simultaneous_fire.description: [bool]If set, it fires one round from each fire node on single fire.

scope_responsiveness.description: How quickly the scope/sight follows changes in aim and movement.

scope_crosshair.description: Crosshair position on screen in [-1, 1] range.

scope_offset.description: X=Right, Y=Up, Z=Forward. Offset of the sight node relative to the default. Is added to the customization settings for applied customizations that affect it.

scope_zeroing.description: What are the different stages of zeroing we are allowed to have?

scope_lens_hides_weapon.description: [bool]Should we hide the weapon when looking through the scope lens? Should be applied for optics that have high zoom.

ergonomics.description: How response is the weapon when turning, aiming and shooting?

constrained_aim_leading.description: [bool]If set, the camera may not get too far away from the aim direction.

allow_fpv.description: [bool]Allow First Person View on this weapon

crosshair_type.description: What does this weapons crosshair look like.

first_person_sight_node.description: [string]The sight of the weapon for first person view.

first_person_optic_attach_node.description: [string]The attach_optic bone of the weapon for first person view.

auto_drop_ability.description: The ability to play when dropping the weapon due to no ammo. Only used for un-realoadable weapons.

enter_first_person_aim_audio_event.description: [wwise]Sound id to play when entering first person aim

exit_first_person_aim_audio_event.description: [wwise]Sound id to play when exiting first person aim

first_person_aim_audio_event_node_id.description: [string]Node at where the on/exit aim down sights sounds are played.

enter_third_person_aim_audio_event.description: [wwise]Sound id to play when entering third person aim

exit_third_person_aim_audio_event.description: [wwise]Sound id to play when exiting third person aim

third_person_aim_audio_event_node_id.description: [string]Node at where the on/exit aim down sights sounds are played.

fire_mode_changed_audio_event.description: [wwise]Sound id to play when changing fire mode

on_fire_rounds_remaining_animation_varia.description: [string]Animation variable to set to the normalized value of the remaining amount of rounds every time we fire our weapon.

on_fire_round_effects.description: Extra particle effect to play when firing a round for this weapon. This effect is fire-and-forget.

on_fire_round_node_scales.description: Node to be scaled firing a round for this weapon.

on_fire_round_anim_event.description: [string]Animation event to trigger every time we fire a round.

on_fire_last_round_anim_event.description: [string]Animation event to trigger when we fire the last round, replaces the normal animation event at that case.

on_fire_round_wielder_anim_event.description: [string]Animation event to trigger on the wielder every time we fire a round.

on_fire_mode_changed_anim_variable.description: [string]The animation variable to set with the new fire mode.

on_fire_mode_changed_wielder_anim_event.description: [string]Animation event to trigger on the wielder / fp wielder every time we change fire mode.

fire_ability.description: The ability to play on the weapon when it fires

weapon_stat_modifiers.description: Used by attachments to specify what stat they modify and not override via normal ADD formatting.

ammo_icon_inner.description: [material]The inner icon for the magazine that shows up on the HUD.

ammo_icon_outer.description: [material]The outer icon for the magazine that shows up on the HUD.

projectile_function_overrides.description: Allows overriding weapon settings per weapon function.
